name: Vampire: Kyuuketsuki Densetsu
description:
Vampir: Kyuuketsuki Densetsu (ヴァンビール　～吸血鬼伝説～) is a Action RPG video game published by Artdink released on March 4th, 1999 for the PlayStation.
Set in 19th century Europe, you take on the role of a young Vampire named Christopher.
Your main objective is to prevent Duran's evil ambitions and stop the nosferatu's subordinates from sucking the blood of humans.
Fortunately, as a vampire, you possess the legendary "Power of Magnum Force" that is capable of destroying Duran.
